[Page Title: Indaco West Palm Beach | Italian Cuisine in The Nora District]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
West Palm Beach

Coming Soon
Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
905 N Railroad Avenue, West Palm Beach, FL 33401 
Hours

Coming Soon

Located in the vibrant Nora District of West Palm Beach, Indaco (Italian for “indigo”) brings the flavors of Italy to a dynamic new community. The menu showcases wood-fired pizzas, hand-crafted pastas, and house-made sausages, available family-style or à la carte. Guests can pair their meals with a thoughtfully curated wine list emphasizing Italian varietals, signature cocktails, local brews, and spirit-free options.

Nora breathes new life into historic railway warehouses, blending character and innovation to create a cornerstone for contemporary West Palm living. Indaco’s inviting atmosphere aligns seamlessly with this vision, offering a front-row seat to the art of Italian cooking.
Get Directions

Indaco Atlanta
Reservations Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
725 Ponce De Leon Ave NE Suite 250, Atlanta, GA 30306 (404) 205-5183 indacoatlanta@theindigoroad.com HOURS Bar Monday - Friday: Opens at 4 p.m. Dinner Sunday - Thursday: 5 – 10 p.m Friday + Saturday: 5 – 11 p.m. Weekend Brunch Saturday + Sunday: 11 - 2:30 p.m. Indaco Café [Grab-and-Go Options with Self-Serve Seating] 8 a.m. -  2:30 p.m. Monday - Friday: Order Pickup Catering Menu LOCATION 
Indaco is located on the office lobby level of the 725 Ponce building, accessible from the main building entrance off of Ponce de Leon or North Avenue, and from the Atlanta BeltLine Eastside Trail.
INDACO ATLANTA 
Located on the BeltLine, Indaco offers a blend of elevated and casual dining with a modern, Italian menu. Enjoy house-made pastas and wood-fired pizzas along with classic piatti, a fresh cocktail menu and an Italian-forward wine list.

For press inquiries, please contact Laura Craft at lecraft@theindigoroad.com
Facebook Instagram PARKING Guests have the option of complimentary self-parking, with parking tickets validated by request after your meal. Self-parking is located below the 725 Ponce building. Valet parking is available Thursday through Saturday. Kroger parking is monitored by a third party and is not affiliated with Indaco or The Indigo Road Hospitality Group. Please call us if you need extra assistance with parking/directions. Get Directions

Indaco Greenville

Indaco Greenville seamlessly blends both elevated and casual dining with an airy, Italian-inspired menu. Indulge with hand-made pasta and wood-fired pizzas, alongside an exciting cocktail menu and an Italian-forward wine list. Enjoy Indaco favorites in our main dining room, or dine al fresco on our covered outdoor patio with access from Main Street.

For press inquiries, please contact Laura Craft at .

Hours

Coming Soon

Italian in Alys Beach

Steps from the Gulf and at home in the heart of Alys Beach, Indaco brings the flavors of Italy to Florida’s Emerald Coast. The space blends coastal charm with Indaco’s signature warmth, inviting guests to linger over hand-crafted pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and shared plates best enjoyed with friends. Whether you’re joining us for a casual evening or a special occasion, the atmosphere is always one of community and connection.

Stay Connected

Be the first to know about opening updates, special dinners, and events unique to Alys Beach. Sign up for our emails and never miss a reason to gather at the table.

At Indaco, we celebrate the spirit of Italian dining, bold flavors, shared plates, and a love for bringing people together. Our Nashville home carries that same energy, with a lively bar, an open kitchen framed by counter seating, and a patio made for lingering over cocktails and conversation.

Set in the heart of Germantown, this location blends neighborhood charm with Indaco’s signature warmth. Whether you’re here for a quick spritz or a long, pasta-filled evening, you’re in the right place.
